01 - Gree Geek

Free Geek

Enrich volunteers' experience, empower the organisation

02 - Project Context

In an Interaction Design course at Simon Fraser University, our design team partnered up with Vancouver Free Geek for 13 weeks to research and come up with a design solution using Human Centred Design methodologies.

03 - Free Geek

Who is Free Geek?

Free Geek is a non-profit organisation that aims to reduce the environmental impact of electronic waste by reusing and recycling donated technology.

Insight
"On a good day, Free Geek’s work force is 80% volunteer based."
Robert, Volunteer Coordinator
04 - Research

Research & Analysis

05 - Insight

Major Challenges in the Organisation

  • Volunteer Retention Problem

    Disorganisation in the volunteering process frustrates volunteer. People are excited to volunteer, but many don’t continue to sign up for shifts.

  • Difficulty Managing Volunteers as a resources

    People are excited to volunteer, but many don’t continue to sign up for shifts.

  • Underutilises Volunteer Workforce

    Because staff don’t know what skills volunteers have, they’re wasting a lot of time trying to assign them appropriate work

6 - Solutions

Proposed Solution

7 - Reflection

Project Takeaway

In this experience, I learn that collaborative design practices like participatory workshops and ethnographic study actually requires a lot of dedicated efforts from partnering organisation/person. They might not be able to involve as much as you want them to be because of different priorities or resource limitations. When it happens, we have to learn to adapt and work with what we have at the moment and still deliver result with the limited resource.

This design project has also taught me the importance of narrowing down focus in the design process. In the beginning of the project, the progression was stalled because we didn't fully commit on any design directions and design thinking, we didn't know when to switch gear from divergent to convergent mode of thinking. Luckily with pressure of deadlines, we manage to pull ourselves together and create a nice solution at the end.
